Detailed Description

Class to solve basic math problems.

bool jvgs::math::MathManager::getLowestPositiveRoot (  float  a,
float  b,
float  c,
float  treshold,
float *  root
)  const
 

Returns the lowest positive root for a quadratic equation in the form of a * x^2 + b * x + c = 0.

Parameters:
a A equation parameter.
b B equation parameter.
c C equation parameter.
treshold The lowest root must be <= this treshold.
root This will contain the root.
Returns:
If a solution was found.
